meanings.definition: Cook in hot oil or fat
meanings.sent1: I like to fry eggs for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: My mom will fry some chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to fry an egg on the sidewalk, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to fry everything in its path on the scorching day.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the food frying in the pan was music to my ears.

meanings.sent1: The aquarium has a tank full of tiny fry swimming around.
meanings.sent2: The fry in the pond are growing quickly.
meanings.sent3: The fish parents were proud of their little fry learning to swim.
meanings.sent4: The fry darted around in the water like shimmering jewels.
meanings.sent5: The fry's scales glistened in the sunlight as they swam gracefully.

meanings.definition: Small food item cooked in hot oil or fat
meanings.sent1: I love to eat french fries with ketchup.
meanings.sent2: The street fair had a booth selling delicious fry bread.
meanings.sent3: The fry sizzled in the pan, releasing a mouth-watering aroma.
meanings.sent4: The fry popped and crackled as they turned golden brown.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the fry cooking made my stomach growl in anticipation.
